title: Daomu Biji: Moving Forward Through the Flowery Night; The End Comes Without A Sound - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Horror   Mystery   Supernatural

description: Black Glasses and Xie Yuchen head to Russia to investigate a mysterious floating corpse in an Orthodox Church. In the midst of it all, they are recruited to help protect a Russian family from a deadly attack by a feng shui master. >
